casebody.data:
Donald RICHARDS v. Charles E. JOINES et al. No. 3415. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Jan. 15, 1947. LaMar & Bailey, of Guymon, Old., and Sparks, Boatman & Farrier, of Woodward, Okl., for appellant. Harry C. Kirkendall, of Enid, Okl., and Wilcox & Wilcox, of Anthony, Kan., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, Circuit Judge, and SYMES, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on application of appellant.
